    Package index

    Geospatial

    add_spatial_lags()
    Add Spatial Lags of a Variable to a Dataset

    Preprocessing

    to_js_array()
    Converts data columns to a js array

    Statistics

    cles()
    Calculates the Common Language Effect Size (CLES)
    get_boot_ci()
    Calculates bootstrapped confidence intervals for a statistic

    Time Series

    add_mase_scale_feat()
    Add a scale feature by using a factor derived from the MASE error function
    add_tsfeatures()
    Add time series features calculated by the tsfeatures package
    create_dtw_grids()
    Create a parameter grid list for dtwclust and dtw distance functions
    descale_by_mase()
    Back-transform a MASE-scaled column
    dtw_dist_gridsearch()
    Perform a grid search of parameters and dtwclust distance functions
    prewhitened_ccf()
    Calculate cross-correlation coefficients for prewhitened time series
    scale_by_mase()
    Scale a group time series by using a factor derived from the MASE error function
    test_fable_resids()
    Autocorrelation test of the residuals of dynamic regression fable models with various specifications that have been fitted for a grouping variable
    test_lm_resids()
    Autocorrelation tests of the residuals of lm models with various specifications that have been fitted for a grouping variable
